title: Firedrake
description: The New York Times best-selling fantasy author brings an epic realm of magic and intrigue! In Firedrake, a land ruled by the shape-shifting Dragon Kings, Cabe Bedlam is hunted for both the legacy he represents and the future he may bring. Yet, dragons may be the least of the dangers, for in a land drenched with sorcery, Cabe's very legacy may be what destroys him!
author: Richard A. Knaak
